thread.title: Hilarious dancing whip cracker on Today Show | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Hilarious dancing whip cracker on Today Show | Daily Mail Online

author: Sinead Maclaughlin For Daily Mail Australia
title: Hilarious dancing whip cracker on Today Show | Daily Mail Online
text: comments A grinning, whip-cracking performer has left the Today Show panel in hysterics with his hilarious and enthusiastic display. To the tune of Robin Thicke's Blurred Lines - Nathan 'Whippy' Griggs showed of his rapid-fire skills much to the delight of hosts Lisa Wilkinson, Sylvia Jeffreys and Deborah Knight. 'I could watch this all day,' one of the panellists exclaim as the three time whip cracking world record holder shows off his moves, complete with back-up dancers. 'I could watch this all day,' one of the Today Show panellists exclaim as Nathan 'Whippy' Griggs shows off his moves to the tune of Robin Thicke's Blurred Lines, complete with back-up dancers The three time whip cracking world record holder even executes a few hip shakes, grinning at the camera as he does so 'I don't know who to watch, they're all so good,' Ms Knight laughs. The background performers, armed with coiled whips in each hand can barely contain their laughter either as they step in time to the music. But it's Mr Griggs who is the real star of the show, flawlessly cracking his whips in time with the beat, throwing in a few turns for good measure. He even executes a few hip shakes, grinning at the camera as he does so. RELATED ARTICLES
